		
Avg. W(L,t) = 1.7306..*(t**0.2896..)

L      Saturation Point	    tx		Log10(L)   Log10(tx) 
128    5.8142006096757628   65.6615     2.10721    1.81731	
256    7.8537394807026280   185.4487    2.40824    2.26822
512    10.985133777951857   590.7913	2.70927    2.77143
1024   14.991295093982066   1728.6861   3.01030    3.23772
2048   20.727978220839987   5292.0167   3.31133    3.72362

LSF for {Log10(tx) vs Log10(L)} is: Log10(tx) = 1.5886*Log10(L) - 1.5402

Slope = z

Therefore, z = 1.5886..
